briefTitle: Detection of Germline and Somatic Pathogenic Variants in Patients With de Novo Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Detection of Germline and Somatic Pathogenic Variants in Patients With de Novo Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants with somatic pathogenic variants in denovo metastatic breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Signed informed consent for the provision of the biological material for research purposes
2. Diagnosis of de novo MBC (histologically confirmed)
3. Age \>18 years
4. Blood samples
5. Tumor tissue block from at least on disease site, primary (preferably) or metastatic

Exclusion Criteria:

Inadequate MBC tissue
